properties.name: redis.list.cache.default-expire-time
properties.description: 默认过期时间（秒），默认30分钟

properties.name: redis.list.cache.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用列表缓存，默认启用

properties.name: redis.list.cache.fallback.circuit-breaker.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用熔断器，默认启用

properties.name: redis.list.cache.fallback.circuit-breaker.failure-threshold
properties.description: 失败阈值，默认5次

properties.name: redis.list.cache.fallback.circuit-breaker.half-open-max-calls
properties.description: 半开状态测试请求数，默认3个

properties.name: redis.list.cache.fallback.circuit-breaker.recovery-time
properties.description: 恢复时间（秒），默认60秒

properties.name: redis.list.cache.fallback.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用降级，默认启用

properties.name: redis.list.cache.fallback.max-retries
properties.description: 最大重试次数，默认3次

properties.name: redis.list.cache.fallback.retry-interval
properties.description: 重试间隔（毫秒），默认100毫秒

properties.name: redis.list.cache.fallback.timeout
properties.description: 连接超时时间（毫秒），默认200毫秒

properties.name: redis.list.cache.key-prefix
properties.description: 缓存键前缀，默认为list_cache

properties.name: redis.list.cache.max-cache-pages
properties.description: 最大缓存页数，默认5页

properties.name: redis.list.cache.monitor.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用监控，默认启用

properties.name: redis.list.cache.monitor.jmx-enabled
properties.description: 是否启用JMX监控，默认关闭

properties.name: redis.list.cache.monitor.metrics-interval
properties.description: 指标收集间隔（秒），默认60秒

properties.name: redis.list.cache.monitor.slow-query-threshold
properties.description: 慢查询阈值（毫秒），默认1000毫秒

properties.name: redis.list.cache.monitor.stats-retention-time
properties.description: 统计信息保留时间（秒），默认24小时

properties.name: redis.list.cache.monitor.verbose-logging
properties.description: 是否启用详细日志，默认关闭

properties.name: redis.list.cache.performance.async-enabled
properties.description: 是否启用异步缓存，默认关闭

properties.name: redis.list.cache.performance.async-thread-pool-size
properties.description: 异步线程池大小，默认5

properties.name: redis.list.cache.performance.batch-size
properties.description: 批量操作大小，默认100

properties.name: redis.list.cache.performance.compression-enabled
properties.description: 是否启用缓存压缩，默认关闭

properties.name: redis.list.cache.performance.compression-threshold
properties.description: 压缩阈值（字节），默认1KB

properties.name: redis.list.cache.performance.warm-up.concurrency
properties.description: 预热并发数，默认3

properties.name: redis.list.cache.performance.warm-up.delay
properties.description: 预热延迟时间（秒），默认30秒

properties.name: redis.list.cache.performance.warm-up.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用预热，默认关闭

properties.name: redis.list.cache.performance.warm-up.key-patterns
properties.description: 预热键模式

properties.name: redis.list.cache.serialization-type
properties.description: 序列化方式，默认JSON

properties.name: redis.list.cache.tenant-aware
properties.description: 是否启用租户隔离，默认启用
